commitResults.messageTitle: Rename Chatbot to Esquie
Add greeting
Add Echo functionality
Add 'add' functionality
Refactor Welcome and Exit Message to seperate functions
Refactor add functionality to separate method
Add list functionality
Create Task class to track task completion
Update Esquie to use Task Class
Add mark and unmark with error checks
Add Todo class
Add support for todo tasks
Refactor todo logic into helper method
Refactor mark logic into helper method
Add Deadline class
Add support for deadline task
Add Event class
Add support for event task
Remove static keyword and modify access modifiers
Update text-ui-test data to verify functionality up to level-4
Add EsquieException class
Update input and expected output files
Add custom exception handling using EsquieException
Update exception messages to include usage examples
Refactor task to use ArrayList
Add support for delete functionality
Update Javadoc comments
Refactor command parsing to use enum and switch
Update JavaDoc and Styling
Esquie.java: Add checkSave() method
commitResults.messageBody:
checkSave() is a foundational method for the upcoming save
functionality.

It performs the following:
* Ensures ./data/esquie.txt exists on startup
* Prevent crashes if the data directory is missing

commitResults.messageTitle: Esquie.java: Add save format for Tasks and enable writing to save file
commitResults.messageBody:
- Add toFileString() method to Task, Todo, Deadline and Event Classes
- Add writeTask() and update taskHandler to use writeTask to
append new tasks to ./data/esquie.txt
- Standardized save format for all tasks

commitResults.messageTitle: Esquie.java: Add save support for task deletion and status update
commitResults.messageBody:
* Implement overwriteAll() to rewrite save file when a task is
modified/deleted
* Update toggleMarkStatus() and deleteHandler() to invoke save operation

commitResults.messageTitle: Esquie.java: Add loadTasks() and refactor inputHandler()
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add loadTasks() to read and deserialize tasks from ./data/esquie.txt
* Implement parseString() to convert file text back into Task objects
* Add overloaded constructors to Task, Todo, Deadline, and Event to
support setting mark status on initialization
* Refactor inputHandler() switch syntax for cleaner code

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-7'
commitResults.messageBody:
* Add Save and Load functionality to Esquie
* Update code styling

commitResults.messageTitle: Deadline.java: Implement date parsing in Deadline tasks
commitResults.messageBody:
Move from String date to a LocalDateTime date is more meaningful
and intuitive for the user experience.

* Refactor Deadline.java to use LocalDateTime instead of String
* Update task save format to support 'yyyy-MM-dd HHmm'
* Update exception handling in Esquie.java to catch invalid date inputs

commitResults.messageTitle: Event.java: Implement date parsing for Event task
commitResults.messageBody:
* Refactor Event.java to store date as LocalDateTime objects
* Move DateTimeFormatter to Task.java for shared usage across subclasses
that have date inputs
* Update input.txt and EXPECTED.txt to verify date format

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'branch-Level-8' * Add date parsing logic to Esquie, Deadline and Event * Update Javadoc comments
Ui.java: Extract Esquie user interaction logic into Ui class
commitResults.messageBody:
* Create Ui.java to handle all output and input scanning
* Refactor Esquie to use Ui methods instead of System.out.println()
* Update Event.java to remove hardcoded indentation
* Update EXPECTED.txt to match the new Ui formatting

commitResults.messageTitle: Storage.java: Extract Esquie storage logic into Storage class
commitResults.messageBody: * Refactor Esquie to use Storage methods (e.g. loadTasks)

commitResults.messageTitle: TaskList.java: Extract taskList logic in Esquie into TaskList class
commitResults.messageBody:
* Encapsulate taskList operations in TaskList.java
* Update Storage.java to accomodate the new architecture of TaskList
* Refactor Esquie.java to coordinate Ui, Storage, TaskList

commitResults.messageTitle: Esquie.java: Refactor to use Command Parser
commitResults.messageBody:
* Refactor Command enum with abstract Command class and subclasses
* Implement AddCommand, DeleteCommand, MarkCommand, ExitCommand
and ListCommand
* Implement Parser class to handle parsing input logic and creation
of Command objects
* Refactor Esquie to delegate input logic to Parser class
* Upate EXPECTED.txt to follow Esquie latest behavior

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'A-MoreOOP'
commitResults.messageBody:
* Create Ui, Storage, Parser, Command, TaskList classes
* Implement Command architecture
* Refactor Esquie to delegate logic to created classes respectively

commitResults.messageTitle: A-Packages: Organize classes into Java packages
commitResults.messageBody: * Create a proper package structure for organization

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'A-Packages'
commitResults.messageBody: * Organize classes into suitable Java packages.

commitResults.messageTitle: Merge branch 'add-gradle-support'
build.gradle: Update configuration
